Player History
Had first career hit on 4/7/1985, off Tom Brennan (LAD)...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/17/1985, hitting .500 with 0 HR, 6 RBI...
Hit first career homerun on 4/23/1985, off Mike Scott (PIT)...
Was selected to the 1985 Allstar game...
7/26/1987: Signed a contract extension with St. Louis, $7,430,000 per year, for 3 years.
Won Gold Glove Award at First Base in 1987...
Won Gold Glove Award at First Base in 1988...
Signed as a free agent by Los Angeles on 4/3/1991 to a 1-year deal worth $1,148,000 per year...
